content:
What a great day to be a birder! Congratulations on participating in the global eBird count! That's a fantastic way to contribute to citizen science and help conservation efforts.

Now, I'd be happy to help you with your question. To provide you with the most accurate suggestions, could you please share the following information about the state park you're planning to visit:

1. The name of the state park
2. The state it's located in
3. The time of year you're planning to visit (season or specific dates)

With this information, I can give you a list of bird species you might expect to see at the park. Additionally, I can also provide you with some tips on the best trails to explore and any specific habitats or features to look out for.

Looking forward to helping you plan your birding adventure!
